description.value:
When you join this college at 3rd level, your study of the countless tails of creation, origin and genesis allows you to learn spells that make your songs and dance bring form to the shapeless. You can prepare these spells when you are the appropriate bard level.

Spell LevelSpells
1st@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7p9IuWrSWFgfyQo2]{Alarm}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.2Q5NgA8N01ZwXfaZ]{Tenser's Floating Disk}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.yGFGZKjd1xX6OrVD]{Find Traps}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.JbxsYXxSOTZbf9I0]{Spiritual Weapon}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.BV0mpbHh29IbbIj5]{Create Food and Water}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.64uo4fHriHLjRUrX]{Meld into Stone}
4th@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7Fw7Bf1k3xxDVr5L]{Fabricate}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.8sgwRh8NUNkn9Vi0]{Secret Chest}
